title: "Improved protein structure refinement guided by deep learning based accuracy estimation"
excerpt: "Here the authors present DeepAccNet, a deep learning framework that estimates per-residue accuracy and residue-residue distance signed error in protein models, which are used to guide Rosetta protein structure refinement."
